column5: Hi all  Just wondering if there are any local fly fishermen/women in the Kenora Ont. Area?  Noticed some very nice lakes having rainbows and brooks in them and would like some advice as to which flies to use for them
Hi Jeff,  Try <thunderbayfishing.com> as there are many northerners on there.  >Bill
Ya.. thats a good idea.. Roger should be able to help you out.
